name: Excel Merger
description: Client-side web tool for merging multiple Excel files into a single workbook with separate tabs. Designed for fast, safe workflows without uploads.
highlights: No file uploads or server processing

name: Work Time Calculator
description: Lightweight time calculation tool built for everyday use. Optimized for quick edits, keyboard input, and easy copy-paste.

name: AI Answer and Transcript
description: Browser-based tool for capturing audio, generating transcripts, and producing AI-powered answers in real time. Built to explore practical voice-to-AI workflows.

name: Polen Dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard for visualizing environmental and pollen-related data. Built as part of a larger pollen monitoring and data collection project.
highlights: Built to support sensor-based data pipelines

name: SAP-Multiagent
description: Experimental multi-agent AI system designed to support SAP consulting workflows. Focused on task assistance, analysis, and internal knowledge support.

name: Compare code program
description: Local web-based tool for comparing code and structured text files side by side. Built to support review, validation, and change tracking workflows.
highlights: Useful for review and validation tasks

name: MoneyCounter
description: Simple visual tool that shows earnings accumulating in real time based on salary input. Built as a motivational and UX-focused experiment.

name: Simple Mandelbrot
description: Small project exploring the Mandelbrot set through code. Built to understand mathematical visualization and rendering fundamentals.

name: Data Hub
description: Central web hub for collecting and presenting sensor and environmental data. Part of the broader pollen monitoring system.
highlights: Built to support live sensor input
Designed as part of a larger system
